column1: Orthrongroth is a location created specifically for The Lord of the Rings Online: Shadows of Angmar. It was the oldest and largest Edain burial mound of the Barrow-downs. It might have been the burial mound of the Kings of Cardolan and/or the place where Frodo Baggins
column4: and Peregrin Took obtained the Daggers of Westernesse.

column1: Category:The Lord of the Rings Online locations
